name: NumberKnight
description:
Enter the dream world of a student that fell asleep during a math exam. You take on the form of a number knight having to overcome various challenges and mathematical puzzles in order to pass your exam in reality.

  • Any block you walk on takes on your number
  • 0ny block that hits you from above will change your number 

    Game is built with a theme "As Above So Below" for Epic's Megajam 2022

    Game may run on low fps on older machines, if FPS is too low, try using console command "scalability 2" which should yield better frame rate.

    List of 3rd party assets (not made by us)
    * Mutant Academy Font https://www.1001fonts.com/mutant-academy-font.html
    * Coding4Web Font https://www.fontspace.com/coding4web
    * Paper Grid Substance material https://substance3d.adobe.com/assets/allassets/77b21cfe8f5d11649d53602f5514570de...
    * ALL SFX came from "Gamemaster Audio - Pro Sound Collection v1.3" from Humble Bundle
